title: Photograph, View from the back of the nave to the altar in an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View from the back of the nave to the altar in an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Semicircular chancel of five blind semi-circular arches. A scalloped skylight above. The reredos of a small arcade with angels in the arches. Candlesticks above. Three panels on the altar; center, the Crucifixion. Through side semi-circular arches, statues of Mary, left, and Joseph, right.

Lower left corner gone; lower right corner creased and torn.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View from the back of the nave to the altar in an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-6
